attributes.action: change the rules of football making it impossible to be offside if you team is wearing a blue kit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i am fed up of teams wearing red who every week get every decision going their way. i want to ask that to make it fair  that the reds get all those dodgy penalties against blues every week that at least we can have a real goal hanger. this super striker can knock the ball into the back of the onion bag just like when we were at school, thus making the match much  fairer when playing the reds 14 men.so no more off sides if you are in blue.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
